name: solstice
title: Solstice
desc: Launch your docs in style with Solstice, the unique and modern documentation template. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4.
article:
Save weeks of time with powerful and unique documentation, fully compatible with Tailwind CSS v4.

Upgrade your website with stunning feature-rich documentation, designed to easily integrate with other templates by Cosmic Themes. With tons of features to make your life easy, itâs the perfect choice for developers, freelancers, and agencies.

Features

  • Full Internationalization (i18n) capabilities with tons of utility functions, examples, and components.
  • Configure easily with the i18n setup script! Simply run npm run docs:config-i18n to configure the languages you are using, or one language only.
  • Easy-to-use, with data and config files for important items on the website. You donât have to go digging through thousands of lines of code to change the site title.
  • Sidebar menu with tabs support easily set-up with a config file
  • MDX Integrated custom components, enabling powerful documentation features.
  • Aside, Badge, Button, Steps, and Tabs components
  • Plus custom components, where you can cancel out default markdown styling with the "not-content" class
  • Built-in MDX docs pages with:
  • Markdown frontmatter validation
  • Heading âcopy linkâ buttons
  • Table of Contents
  • Expressive Code for superpowered code blocks
  • Important SEO features like OG tags, Twitter cards, and other metadata - already taken care of.
  • View transitions enabled, with a one-line config change to disable.
  • Fully responsive
